pr_title: build: disable -Werror compiler argument in tests

timeline.message: build: disable -Werror compiler argument in tests

timeline.bodyText: fyi: a similar block exists in 5.2.x but does not exist in 5.1.x. Since these changes will be transferred to more recent branches, I decided to include it in 5.1.x as well, but lmk if you prefer for this to be removed. This execution adds the -parameters switch to javac (available in java 8, this must be a branch that supports java 8)
timeline.author: kkonstantine
